title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log in to their account even after multiple password reset attempts.

title: Payment Failed - Card Declined
description: Customer attempted to pay using Visa ending 1234 but payment keeps failing despite sufficient balance.

title: Unable to Download Invoice
description: Customer cannot download their January invoice from the billing section.

title: Incorrect Billing Address
description: Customer reports incorrect billing address on their invoice.

title: App Crash on Launch
description: Mobile app crashes immediately upon opening on Android 13.

title: Refund Not Processed
description: Refund requested two weeks ago has not been received yet.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Issue
description: Customer is not receiving 2FA codes on their registered phone number.

title: Unable to Update Profile Picture
description: Uploading a new profile picture results in an 'Upload failed' error.

title: Subscription Auto-Renewal
description: Auto-renewal toggle is disabled and cannot be enabled.

title: Missing Order Confirmation Email
description: Order confirmation email not received despite successful payment.
